headline: Inspiring Testimonials From Pain to Freedom

textTestimonials.testimonial: Due to the intensity of my sciatica pain, I could barely walk into the clinic. Not only did Ben meet me in the parking lot to help me, but he and Dr. Lauren were patient and thorough as they explained the process and goals of robotic therapy. I felt immediate relief just after my first session. 8 days and a few sessions later, I am back to a basic level of activity. - Rachel Alderton

Pain so bad that I thought I might have to quit my job, which was only made worse by worry about how I would keep taking care of my family. Chiropractors hadn't been any help. After my first visit, I was already back on my feet and in the game! I've chatted with other clients who were saved from surgery or from decades-long chronic pain that chiropractors and doctors were unable to help other than by giving out narcotics to mask the pain. - Todd

I have been suffering with sciatica and some other issues and after the first 2 hour session I was able to walk and do everyday activities with much less pain. After my second session I was able to fly back to Florida comfortably, which is life changing, because I fly a lot for work. Even if you aren't sure, call and have a conversation. You won't be disappointed. Thank you to the staff. - Cara Culmone

I have to admit, I was unsure at first...a robot...how is this going to help better than regular PT?!? Now having gone 3 times so far...O.M.G...this place is amazing!!!!!  I have had lower back pain, SI joint issues for years and have done PT several times.  I felt noticeable relief after my first session and I feel better each time.  I ran and played soccer with my kids for the first time ever!!!  Dr. Jack and Corryn are very personable and knowledgeable and the place is spotless!- Dough Ferner

I was having issues with my hip after a hard fall and gave this a try.  I had done chiropractors for this issue in the past.  I did 4 treatments and am feeling so much better! Thanks for the treatment.  I will definitely be back if I have future issues!- Sally Gobrogge
I've known Steve & Lynn for over 13 years.  This concept of therapy is revolutionary. I believe this is the best possible solution for P.T. Related issues.- Paul Pulte
